data.name: Error_Generic
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and provide the trace ID.
data.comment: A generic fallback error for unhandled exceptions.

data.name: Error_Unauthorized
data.value: Authentication is required to access this resource.
data.comment: For actions requiring a valid JWT token when none is provided or it's invalid.

data.name: Error_Forbidden
data.value: You do not have permission to perform this action.
data.comment: When an authenticated user lacks the required roles or claims (e.g., a User trying an Admin action).

data.name: Error_Validation
data.value: One or more validation errors occurred.
data.comment: The main title for a 400 Bad Request due to validation failures. Details will be in the response body.

data.name: Error_ResourceNotFound
data.value: The requested resource could not be found.
data.comment: A generic message for when a resource is not found.

data.name: Error_ProductNotFound
data.value: The product with the specified ID was not found.
data.comment: Specific error for when a product lookup fails.

data.name: Error_OrderNotFound
data.value: The order with the specified ID was not found.
data.comment: Specific error for when an order lookup fails.

data.name: Error_Conflict
data.value: A conflict occurred with the current state of the resource.
data.comment: A generic message for state-related conflicts.

data.name: Error_OrderShippedCannotCancel
data.value: The order cannot be canceled because it has already been shipped.
data.comment: Specific domain rule violation for canceling a shipped order.
